body.name: bubblebum Inflatable Booster Car Seat, Backless Booster Seat for Car, Kids Travel Car Booster Seat for 4+ Year Old, Portable Child Car Booster Seat 40-100 lbs, Narrow Slim Perfect for Middle - Emoji
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 mins
features: The Ultimate Travel Booster Car Seat - Unlock the convenience of the USA’s Original backless inflatable booster seat. BubbleBum is the only inflatable childrens booster seat for your car with a patented system to guarantee stability and comfort on every journey

Safety You Can Count On – BubbleBums patented ComfortMax technology exceeds all US federal car safety standards (FMVSS213) for booster car seats 40 lbs and up to 100 lbs. Your car booster seat comes with a seat belt positioning clip for optimal seat belt fit and comfort

Take Anywhere Travel Car Seat – Your inflatable carseat is perfect for everyday use, car rentals, taxis, vacations and carpooling. Take your new backless booster seat on all your school trips and adventures. Perfect for your little toddlers, girls and boys aged 4 to 11 years old

Practical Dimensions Fits a Car Load of Kids – The narrow, compact and slim BubbleBum booster seat is perfect for the middle seat, even small cars. It fits between 2 full-size car seats, allowing 3 kids across the back of almost any car

Global Award Winner - BubbleBum has won the ‘Mom's Best Award,’ and the ‘Parent Tested Parent Approved' award, plus dozens more. Ask our millions of happy car seat customers how much they trust the BubbleBum name. Your Bubblebum Car Booster Seat also comes with a lifetime guarantee
body.description: BubbleBum Inflatable Portable Car Booster Seat Your child will travel in comfort and safety on the BubbleBum portable car booster seat. You'll appreciate how portable the booster seat is and the way it protects your child by raising them up to the proper height for the seat belt. Your child will love how comfortable it is, and that they can carry it with them wherever they go. This seat is BubbleBum ComfortMax Engineered to help protect your child in frontal, rear, & rollover crashes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Highlights you will love It supports children from 40-100 lb Inflates and deflates in seconds Weighs just 1lb Easy to stow away Surface washable BubbleBum Inflatable Portable Car Booster Seat Your child will travel in comfort and safety on the BubbleBum portable car booster seat. You'll appreciate how portable the booster seat is and the way it protects your child by raising them up to the proper height for the seat belt. Your child will love how comfortable it is, and that they can carry it with them wherever they go. This seat is BubbleBum ComfortMax Engineered to help protect your child in frontal, rear, & rollover crashes.

Key Features You'll Love The Portable Booster for Your Big Kid For children 40-100lbs. 10 X lighter than the average booster. ComfortMax Engineered Crash tested under rigorous conditions to help protect your child in frontal, rear, and rollover crashes. Cool Designs & Comfy Journeys Loved by Kids Across the Globe.
More Features to Love Portable Inflates and deflates in seconds. Easy to Carry 10 X lighter than the average booster seat Fits 3 Across Saves on space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All moms need this!!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter who has three children! They travel often ,also her children are in several activities!! She said it comes in handy and saves moving their regular seats from car to car, saves a lot of the chaos at the airport considering she has the young children and had to take three car seats when traveling. This is amazing and save a lot of work for her! Grandma you not sure what to get your grown children? Do them a big favor and buy one or two of these they will thank you just like my daughter did. Also a doctor she works with says she never goes anywhere without one!!! The price is great the quality is great order some today!! You won’t be sorry. Shellie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Justo lo que esperaba…
reviews.reviewText: El producto llegó muy rápido y se adaptó a lo que estaba buscando, recomendado 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: Really great for traveling! Just roll up in a small bag and put it with your carry on on the plane. It literally inflates / deflates within seconds of blowing it in or out. Super convenient In the rental car on vacation. My 6-year old loved it and was comfortable sitting there. We used it for 2 weeks and it was great!The only thing is, read the instructions as you are not supposed to leave this seat inflated for a long period of time in a hot car. But that wasn’t a problem for me since it inflates so quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this one. Not heavy, easy to clean and durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for travel when regular seat is not an option
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to inflate and put in the car, but the seat slips around a lot. I wish it had a rubber antislip material on the bottom. I found myself holding it in place during the ride. It did give my son the extra inches to be able to safely use a regular seat belt. We only used this during travel to and from airport 15 minute drives max. Easy to deflate and store in a backpack while not using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of those. Both after about two weeks started leaking air. I'm trying a different brand now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: After the reviews I read, I was really optimistic about this product, however, after blowing the bubblebum up, about 5 minutes into my 45lb Child sitting on it, it tore. Pretty disappointed in the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars We loved it until
reviews.reviewText: It must have a slow leak? It just keeps deflating. Pretty bummed about it.
